content: Our adjusted net income for the quarter was $326 million, or $1.18 per diluted share, and our EBITDAX for the quarter came in at $598 million, 93% higher than last year's third quarter. In the third quarter, we spent $242 million on our development, and exploratory activities including $227 million on our operated Haynesville and Bossier Shale drilling program, we also spent $4 million on non-operated wells and $11 million on other development activity.
